FuncDef: The ecc local-key-pair destroy command deletes the local ECC keys. The ecc local-key-pair destroy command deletes the local ECC keys. By default, no local ECC host key pair exists in the system.
Examples: Warning: These keys will be destroyed. Continue? Please select [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: A local key pair is a prerequisite to a successful SSH login. If you no longer need the local ECC key pairs, run the ecc local-key-pair destroy command to delete them.
